articles.title: Rory McIlroy needed break from golf for 'mental and emotional wellbeing' - The Guardian
articles.description: Rory McIlroy’s disappointing performance at the Masters left him needing to take a break from the game for his ‘mental and emotional wellbeing’
articles.content: Rory McIlroys disappointing performance at the Masters left him needing to take a break from the game for his mental and emotional wellbeing, but the world No 3 has said he is ready to return to the … [+10141 chars]
